alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 9:26AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hardin County through 1000 AM EDT... At 925 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Elizabethtown, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Hardin County, including the following locations... Cecilia, Long View, Howe Valley, Hansbrough, Addington Field Airport, Younger Creek, Crest, Gaithers, Four Corners and Saint John. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until noon EDT for central Kentucky.
